name: panicking::assert_failed

panicking::assert_failed_inner.doc: Non-generic version of the above functions, to avoid code bloat.

src:
pub fn assert_failed<T, U>(
    kind: AssertKind,
    left: &T,
    right: &U,
    args: Option<fmt::Arguments<'_>>,
) -> !
where
    T: fmt::Debug + ?Sized,
    U: fmt::Debug + ?Sized,
{
    assert_failed_inner(kind, &left, &right, args)
}
